availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Alice Chapman Clark (Hartford County, Connecticut, resident)

body.p: Hartford County, Connecticut, resident. Connecticut native. Married to Edmund Clark. Mother of Daniel W. Clark. Resident of Hartford County, Connecticut, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Connecticut, Hartford County, Marlborough, p. 425.
Connecticut, U.S., Town Birth Records, pre-1870 (Barbour Collection), Ancestry, Colchester, Connecticut.
"Alice Chapman Clark (1779-1865)," Find A Grave, Memorial 7029035, accessed November 15, 2023, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/7029035.
